content: © 2011 asparagus & mayonnaise asparagusmayonnaise blogspot com the dragon egg wristlet / dice bag original pattern by susan gater 26 june 2011 beta version this has not been test crocheted i have done my best to be clear and accurate but you know how it is please let me know if you find any problems with this pattern materials patons classic wool worsted weight 100% wool in the following colors ◦ main color mc jade heather -- 1 skein ◦ contrasting color cc royal blue 1 skein size us i 5 5mm crochet hook size 8 5mm double-pointed knitting needles optional yarn needle gauge is not important for this piece directions bag body with mc 6 single_crochet in magic_ring join w slip_stitch ch1 do not turn work between rounds throughout the project round 1 2 single_crochet in each st around join with slip_stitch in first st of round 12 single_crochet round 2 single_crochet in same single_crochet as joining 2 single_crochet in next stitch single_crochet in next st 2 single_crochet in next st five times join with slip_stitch to the first st of the round chain 1 18 single_crochet round 3 single_crochet in same single_crochet as joining and in next st 2 single_crochet in next stitch single_crochet in next 2 st 2 single_crochet in next st five times join with slip_stitch to the first st of the round chain 1 24 single_crochet round 4 single_crochet in same single_crochet as joining and in next 2 st 2 single_crochet in next stitch single_crochet in next 3 st 2 scin next st five times join with slip_stitch to the first st of the round chain 1 30 single_crochet round 5 single_crochet in same single_crochet as joining and in next 3 st 2 single_crochet in next stitch single_crochet in next 4 st 2 single_crochet in next st five times join with slip_stitch to the first st of the round chain 1 36 single_crochet page 1 of 3 © 2011 asparagus & mayonnaise asparagusmayonnaise blogspot com round 6 single_crochet in same single_crochet as joining and in next 4 st 2 single_crochet in next stitch single_crochet in next 5 st 2 single_crochet in next st five times join with slip_stitch to the first st of the round chain 1 42 single_crochet round 7 single_crochet in same single_crochet as joining and in next 5 st 2 single_crochet in next stitch single_crochet in next 6 st 2 single_crochet in next st five times join with slip_stitch to the first st of the round chain 1 48 single_crochet note from this point on it is very important that you work from the outside of the piece with the outside of the bag facing you round 8 working in back loops only single_crochet in same st as joining and in each st around join with slip_stitch to the first st of the round chain 3 round 9 double_crochet in next st and in each st around join with single_crochet in the front loop of the first st of the round
